text: <@U22PU4G4A> <@U22PJPGK0> would be helpful to have an add row button at the top in addition to the bottom. If you have a bunch of rows you have to scroll all the way to the bottom to add a row
<@U22PU4G4A> <@U22PJPGK0> Can we please get the column names to show the column names in the actual case it was created in? It shows in call caps currently
good suggestions <@U25EHAP7G> and <@U25PYL3Q8>. We'll take a look
